intent_atoms.description: Integrate FoundationUI components for form controls and input wrappers (I1.4) including wrapping DS.TextInput, DS.Toggle, DS.Picker, migrating existing patterns, ensuring ≥90% test coverage, WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility.
Test suite coverage for I1.4 must be at least 90%.
Accessibility validation for I1.4 must meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards.

Implement advanced layouts and navigation using FoundationUI grid and spacing system (I1.5), migrate sidebar and detail view layouts, validate responsive behavior across device sizes, support accessibility and dark mode.
Responsive behavior must be validated across all target device sizes for I1.5.
Create SDK tolerant parsing documentation (T6.3) including DocC article, code examples, inline docs updates, linking guide from main Documentation.md, and verifying examples with test file.
DocC article TolerantParsingGuide.md must be created in specified path.
Code examples for tolerant parsing setup and ParseIssueStore usage must be included.
Inline documentation for ParsePipeline.Options .strict and .tolerant must be updated.
Guide must be linked from main Documentation.md Topics section.
Examples verified with test file in Tests/ISOInspectorKitTests.

Implement Floating Settings Panel Shell (C21) with FoundationUI cards, macOS NSPanel host, remembered frame, keyboard shortcut ⌘,, iPad/iOS sheet detents, VoiceOver focus start at selected section, snapshot and accessibility tests.
Snapshot and accessibility tests must validate both macOS and iPad/iOS presentations for C21.

Implement Persistence + Reset Wiring (C22) threading permanent changes through UserPreferencesStore, updating DocumentSessionController with SessionSettingsPayload mutations, adding reset actions, logging, and DocC documentation of layered persistence behavior.
Reset actions must include "Reset Global" and "Reset Session" options.
FoundationUI integration tasks must only proceed after Phase 0 is complete.
